string-array.name: easy_questions
string-array.item: Be able to speak all the languages of the world, or be able to talk to animals?
Have the ability to rewind your life or pause it?
Give up salt or give up sugar?
Have the ability to read other people\'s minds or fly?
Be born with the trunk of an elephant or the long neck of a giraffe?
Be very hairy or completely bald?
Would you prefer cheese or chocolate?
Do you know Spanish at an average level or perfect Chinese?
To shave his head or dye your hair a light green color?
Drink tea in a posh restaurant or eat your fill in fast food?
Work only in a women\'s team all your life or all your life alone?
Kill a fly or an ant?
Work at a job with a high salary and do not have time to do a hobby or earn a hobby for little money?
Never correspond with anyone or be able to call a person?
To unsubscribe from the letters A or O when writing?
Call your child by the name of your first love, provided that your partner knows about it, or call your partner by the name of your first love?
To be angry and lonely or kind, but constantly used?
Stop using your computer or phone?
Take an old-fashioned name or a terrible last name?
Live during world war I or world war II?
Be strong but cowardly, or weak but reckless?
Do you only do extreme sports or don\'t do sports at all?
Never eat anything sweet or salty?
Take a walk in Europe or lie by the sea in Thailand?

string-array.name: normal_questions
string-array.item: Experience constant pain or unbearable itching?
Die in a fire or freeze to death?
Wipe your face with sandpaper or use vinegar instead of eye drops?
So that no one comes to your wedding or no one comes to your funeral?
Opt out of facebook or opt out of YouTube?
Eat a friend\'s goat or your grandmother\'s earwax?
Lick a street dog\'s fur or stick your finger up a pet cat\'s ass?
Come to work in your underwear or have sex in front of your parents?
Walk naked at night in the center of Bangkok or spend the day smelly homeless?
Noticeably scratch between the legs at a meeting or fart in the Elevator with colleagues?
Tell the boss "Hey you" or the girl "You f* * K"?
Lose a big toe or be born with a birthmark on half of your face?
Wear a t-shirt with a picture of a penis or a picture of a vagina?
Go all your life without underwear or all your life in the same ones?
Eat a live African cockroach or stay for an hour with a Python in a cage?
Raise a child from a previous spouse\'s marriage or take a child from an orphanage?
A lifetime without an orgasm or delicious food?
Drink 2 liters of water in one gulp or stay in a cold bath for 5 hours?
Sleep for 20 hours a day, or do not sleep all your life, but always want to?
Accuse an innocent person of theft or lie to a child for the rest of their life that Santa Claus exists?
Tell your own child that he is adopted or lie all your life that the adopted child is your own?
Drink only vodka or never drink at all?
Have a completely flat chest or a size 5 breast?
To become a proctologist or a pathologist?
Never sit or lie down again?
Survive hunger for a week or insomnia for a month?
Give your child to another family or never have a child of your own?
Wear only black clothes all your life, or wear all the colors of the rainbow every time?
To die after 35 a happy person or at 80 an unhappy one?

string-array.name: hard_questions
string-array.item: Sleep with a homeless woman or eat a friend\'s burp?
Drink from a puddle or slap a man\'s ass in a bar?
To be a member of 35 cm or to have a member of 7cm?
Drink a bottle of vodka in one gulp or sing "my Bunny" in the store?
Eat a fly or go to work in Slippers?
Sleep with a chlamydia prostitute without a condom or let a beautiful guy give you a Blowjob?
Become a man of the other sex for one day, or become a dog for one day?
Spend the night in an abandoned psychiatric hospital or spend the night in a gay club?
Sunbathe on a public beach for an hour completely naked or pour a bottle of milk on your head in a store?
Chop off your hand or chop off your penis?
Confess your love to a neighbor or lick the road near the house?
Shove a chainsaw or a fan up the author\'s ass?
Eat a glass of soda and wash it down with vinegar, or eat a pack of Mentos and wash it down with a coke?
Pee in public or take a piss in the toilet and spend 3 hours cleaning up?
Poop in a store unnoticed by people or pee in public on the street?
Put a gay porn screensaver on your desktop or tell a huge guy in a bar that you like him?
Take a video of you pooping and send it to your first love, or take a video of you masturbating and send it to your (former) class teacher?
Kick a big guy in a bar and try to run away or publicly spit in a strange girl\'s face?
Burn a cigarette on your forehead or use Internet Explorer for the rest of your life?
Fuck an ugly woman or give the most beautiful guy a mouthful?
Masturbate in front of colleagues or sit on a Dildo in a nursing home?
Substitute the boss and take his place, or never climb the career ladder?
Eat a bird\'s poop or take a dip in an elephant\'s shit pool?
Be able to wash only once a month or spend your entire life urinating in a bucket?
Never love or never have an orgasm?
Experience involuntary orgasms in unexpected places or fart 6 times a day, but at a certain time?
Have a thick penis, but short or long, but very thin?
Do you want to sleep with 10 people in an evening or just one person for the rest of your life?
Don\'t go to the toilet in a big way for a week or sit on the piss rim of the toilet?
Have both hands left or just one leg?
Have a very pimply face or body with ulcers?
